Package com.teddy.data

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    About
    Activity which displays a presentation video about the application.
    ConnectionDetector
    Activity which checks whether the device is actively connected to the internet.
    Data
    Activity which makes HTTP requests to the server.
    DatePickerFragment
    Activity which creates a dialog displaying the calendar so the user can choose the date (implemented but not used/needed).
    Info
    Activity which creates a graph displaying the costs and the possible savings.
    Instr
    Activity which displays the application instructions.
    JsonParser
    Object that contains and parses JSON strings.
    LoginActivity
    Activity which displays a login screen to the user, offering registration as well.
    Power
    Activity which displays a screen to the user with the power usage information in the last 15 minutes.
    PowerChart
    Activity which creates a pie chart displaying the costs and the possible savings.
    RequestHelper
    Activity which checks the connection to the internet.
    Settings
    Activity which gives the possibility to the user to choose different options.
    Stats
    Activity which displays power usage statistics for different periods of time.
    Support
    Activity which displays the contact details.
    UsageScreen
    Activity which displays the computer usage across different buildings and rooms.
